output.conclusion: By the end of this course, you will have a strong foundation in creative coding principles and be able to create interactive and visually engaging projects using code.
output.introduction: Welcome to the Intermediate Creative Coding course! This course builds upon basic programming concepts and introduces you to the exciting world of creating art, visuals, and interactive experiences through code. We'll explore various tools and techniques to bring your creative ideas to life.

chapters.description: Overview of generative art principles and its applications in various fields.
Installing and configuring the Processing development environment.
Learning to draw basic shapes (rectangles, circles, lines) using Processing code.
Understanding color models and applying them to create visually appealing art.
Overview of p5.js and its capabilities for web-based creative coding.
Setting up a local development environment and including p5.js in your HTML file.
Adding interactivity to your sketches using mouse and keyboard input.
Loading and manipulating images and sound files in p5.js.
Understanding the principles of data visualization and its importance.
Learning to fetch data from external APIs using JavaScript.

chapters.chapterTitle: Visualizing Data with Charts and Graphs
chapters.description: Creating different types of charts and graphs (bar charts, line graphs, scatter plots) using p5.js.
Adding interactivity to data visualizations for better data exploration.
